projectGridLines.title: Devops Engineer
projectGridLines.description:
About this opportunity

We are seeking a motivated individual to join our team as an Entry-Level Azure DevOps Engineer. This role is focused on the

foundational aspects of Azure DevOps, including security, compliance, networking, and continuous integration and delivery

(CI/CD). Prior experience is not required, making this an excellent opportunity for those looking to start their career in a

supportive and growth-oriented environment.

In this role, you will...

• Develop and maintain CI/CD pipelines to automate and streamline operations.

• Implement and uphold security measures and compliance controls within the Azure DevOps framework.

• Manage networking resources to ensure secure and efficient configurations.

• Facilitate the deployment of applications across various Azure services in adherence to security policies.

• Collaborate with teams to integrate security and compliance practices into the DevOps lifecycle.

• Engage in process improvement initiatives for CI/CD, including automation, monitoring, and optimization.

• Keep abreast of the latest trends and technologies in Azure DevOps, security, and compliance.

In this role, you’ll need ...

• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field, or equivalent educational

experience.

• A foundational understanding of Azure DevOps, security, compliance, and networking principles.

• Knowledge of CI/CD methodologies.

• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

• Excellent communication and teamwork capabilities.

• A proactive learning mindset and adaptability in a dynamic environment.

Preferred (but not required):

• Azure, security, or networking certifications.

• Experience with DevOps practices through internships or academic projects.
